mapper.insert: insert into file(user_id, parent_id, file_name, file_size, file_type, hdfs_path, last_update_time, is_delete) VALUES (#{userId}, #{parentId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, 1, #{hdfsPath}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 1);
insert into file(user_id, parent_id, file_name, file_type, last_update_time, is_delete) VALUES (#{userId}, #{parentId}, #{fileName}, 0, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 1);
mapper.select: select * from file where user_id = #{userId} and parent_id = #{parentId} and is_delete = 1
mapper.update: update file set is_delete = 0 where id = #{id}
update file set file_name = #{fileName} where id = #{id}
